title: Pixel 2 XL : Not organised on connection to Computer, Not recognized on connecting to Android Auto
content:
Hi,

I recently noticed that my Pixel 2 xl is not getting recognized or detected on connecting to a Computer and a Android Auto device. Previously it was working fine in both cases.
I even tried changing the usb cable and connecting to multiple devices. But charging is working fine and earphones are also working through the usb port.
I also did a factory reset, but the issue still persists. Can anyone help me with this issue.
